Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension Vista® Ethyl Alcohol (ETOH) Flex® Reagent Cartridge (K5022)
Dimension Vista® ETOH Flex® Reagent Cartridge
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Dade Behring Dimension Vista® E System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension Vista ETOH Flex reagent cartridge for quantitative ethyl alcohol measurement in serum, plasma, and urine using enzymatic ADH method
Indications for Use Summary: In-vitro diagnostic test for quantitative measurement of ethyl alcohol in human serum, plasma, and urine for diagnosis and treatment of alcohol intoxication and poisoning
